title: New to NC and can\'t for the life of me figure out the designations of NW, SW, N, SE etc on some street names.  There seems to be no rhyme nor reason for them. ????
text:
From my experience here, those designations are in relation to a main
road. For example, Wilmington streets north of Market Street carry the
north designation, while streets south of Market carry the south
designation.



In Brunswick County, you'll see those same designations along U.S.
17 or other major highways.
